<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage238"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payouts above Threshold
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$10,800.00 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA Goal:
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$81,000.00 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $10,800.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $108,000.00 + $64,800.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$172,800.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $81,000.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $324,000.00 + $81,000.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$405,000.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($172,800.00 + $405,000.00) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $577,800.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage239"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $108,000.00 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$71,280.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $324,000.00 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$121,500.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($71,280.00 + $121,500.00) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $192,780.00 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$144,585.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect
	at December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	This Participation Letter describes the terms of your participation in the Aspen Aerogels, Inc. Bonus Plan (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;) during fiscal year 2016. This Participation Letter is subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, a copy of which has been provided to you. References to &#147;EBITDA&#148; in this Participation Letter shall be deemed to refer
	to &#147;Adjusted EBITDA&#148; as such term is used in and defined in the Plan.
</P>

<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage241"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$3,756.25 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA
	Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$28,171.88 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $3,756.25
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $37,562.50 + $22,537.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$60,100.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $28,171.88
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $112,687.50 + $28,171.88
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$140,859.38
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($60,100.00 + $140,859.38) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $200,959.38
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage242"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $37,562.50 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $24,791.25
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $112,687.50 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$42,257.81
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($24,791.25 + $42,257.81) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $67,049.06 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $50,286.80
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect at
	December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.

	&#147;Plan&#148;) during fiscal year 2016. This Participation Letter is subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, a copy of which has been provided to you. References to &#147;EBITDA&#148; in this Participation Letter shall be deemed to refer
	to &#147;Adjusted EBITDA&#148; as such term is used in and defined in the Plan.

	25% or $35,421.38 based on Company Revenue Goal
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	goal.

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">

	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	MBO Goals
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage244"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</B>

	Payouts above Threshold
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$3,542.14 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA
	Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$26,566.03 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $3,542.14
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $35,421.38 + $21,252.83
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$56,674.20
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $26,566.03
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $106,264.13 + $26,566.03
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$132,830.16
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($56,674.20 + $132,830.16) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $189,504.36
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage245"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $35,421.38 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $23,378.11
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $106,264.13 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$39,849.05
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($23,378.11 + $39,849.05) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $63,227.15 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $47,420.37
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect at
	December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.
</P>

</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	Signature:
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:1PT; BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;/s/ John Fairbanks
</P>
</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;

	Dated: 1-27-2016

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	2016 Participation Letter
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	Corporate Personnel

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

	Aerogels, Inc. Bonus Plan

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This Participation Letter describes the terms of your participation in the Aspen Aerogels, Inc. Bonus Plan (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;) during fiscal year 2016. This Participation Letter is subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, a copy of which has been provided to you. References to &#147;EBITDA&#148; in this Participation Letter shall be deemed to refer
	to &#147;Adjusted EBITDA&#148; as such term is used in and defined in the Plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	goal.

	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<B>
	MBO Goals
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage247"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payouts above Threshold
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$2,625.00 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA
	Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$19,687.50 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue
	for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $2,625.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $26,250.00 + $15,750.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$42,000.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $19,687.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $78,750.00 + $19,687.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$98,437.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($42,000.00 + $98,437.50) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $140,437.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage248"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $26,250.00 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $17,325.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $78,750.00 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$29,531.25
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($17,325.00 + $29,531.25) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $46,856.25 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $35,142.19
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect at
	December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.
</P>

	&#147;Plan&#148;) during fiscal year 2016. This Participation Letter is subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, a copy of which has been provided to you. References to &#147;EBITDA&#148; in this Participation Letter shall be deemed to refer
	to &#147;Adjusted EBITDA&#148; as such term is used in and defined in the Plan.

	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage250"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payouts above Threshold
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$2,144.35 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA
	Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$16,082.59 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue
	for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $2,144.35
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $21,443.45 + $12,866.07
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$34,309.52
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $16,082.59
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $64,330.35 + $16,082.59
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$80,412.94
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($34,309.52 + $80,412.94) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $114,722.46
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage251"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $21,443.45 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14,152.68
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $64,330.35 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$24,123.88
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($14,152.68 + $24,123.88) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $38,276.56 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $28,707.42
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect at
	December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.
</P>

	This Participation Letter describes the terms of your participation in the Aspen Aerogels, Inc. Bonus Plan (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;) during fiscal year 2016. This Participation Letter is subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, a copy of which has been provided to you. References to &#147;EBITDA&#148; in this Participation Letter shall be deemed to refer
	to &#147;Adjusted EBITDA&#148; as such term is used in and defined in the Plan.

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	goal.

	&nbsp;

<B>
	MBO Goals
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Finished Goods Goal
</B>
	: Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced if, on December&nbsp;31, 2016, the Finished Goods Inventory is less than
	$4 million. The Adjusted EBITDA used to calculate bonus payouts shall be reduced by 32.5% of any shortfall to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target. The Revenue used to calculate the bonus payouts shall be reduced by 132.5% of any shortfall
	to the $4 million Finished Goods Inventory target.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<A NAME="eolPage253"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Plant 2 Goal:
</B>
	Except as determined by the Board, the bonus amount otherwise payable under this Participation Letter shall be reduced by 25%, if, prior to December&nbsp;31, 2016, Aspen Aerogels, Inc. has not
	(i)&nbsp;received financing commitments necessary to fund fully the first phase of the Plant 2 capital project, and (ii)&nbsp;completed the related Board Decision Package for Major Capital Investments in a manner satisfactory to the Board.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Payouts above Threshold
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	You will earn a bonus for actual Company Revenue and EBITDA above Threshold equal to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Company
	Revenue Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$1,925.00 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	EBITDA
	Goal:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;$14,437.50 per $1M
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Examples
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Revenue of $115.0M, EBITDA of $7.5M, Fin Goods of $6.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	No payout
	under either goal as EBITDA Goal Threshold not achieved.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $131.975M, EBITDA of $14.475M, Fin Goods of $1.0M, P2 Goal Met:
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue
	for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual Revenue minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M &#150; [$4.0M - $1.0M] *132.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $131.975M - $3.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $128.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds Target by $6.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 6.0 * $1,925.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $19,250.00 + $11,550.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$30,800.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Actual EBITDA minus [$4.0M minus Actual Fin Goods] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - [$4.0M - $1.0M] * 32.5%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $14.475M - $0.975M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $13.5M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA above Target by $ 1.0M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award plus 1.0 * $14,437.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $57,750.00 + $14,437.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$72,187.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($30,800.00 + $72,187.50) * 100%
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $102,987.50
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	- 2 -
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage254"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Revenue of $118.6M and EBITDA of $10.0M, Fin Goods of $9.0M, P2 Goal Not Met :
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to Revenue Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $118.6M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Revenue exceeds
	Threshold by $6.6M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $6.6M / ($122.0M-$112.0M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $19,250.00 * 0.66
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $12,705.00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA for Bonus Payouts
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Fin Goods &gt; $4.0M, No Adjustment to EBITDA Necessary
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $10.0M
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	EBITDA exceeds
	Threshold by $1.5M
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Payout of Target Award * $1.5M / ($12.5M-$8.5M)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $57,750.00 * 0.375
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	=
	$21,656.25
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<U>
	Total Payout:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(Revenue Payout + EBITDA Payout) * Plant 2 Factor
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= ($12,705.00 + $21,656.25) * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $34,361.25 * .75
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:6%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	= $25,770.94
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All amounts shown are based on current base salary. However, actual bonus will be calculated and paid based on actual base salary in effect at
	December&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Accepted: I hereby accept my designation as a Participant in the Plan. I agree to keep the terms and conditions of my
	participation in the Plan confidential and not to divulge such terms and conditions.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="7%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="1%">
</TD>

</TD>

</TD>

	Signature:
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
